title: Not getting my 40 tickets for the final mission for Blitzcrank.
body: Is anyone else not getting their 40 tickets for matching with Blitzcrank and winning? I just played a Co-op game and didn't get my reward. I played against Blitzcrank and nothing.

replies.body: Sometimes that mission completion can be delayed a bit, meaning it could take a little while until it registers the match you played. Do me a favor and check for that mission completion again and let me know if it still hasn't been registered.
I got my 40 tickets, but I had to do another bot game and, luckily, Blitzcrank was there. Thanks for the help though!
